Почему я рекомендую эту игру?Потому что в ней всё самое необходимое, для хорошей видеоигры !Приятная графика,хорошая оптимизация(даже для слабых ПК) сам жанр игры-головоломка ,удобный гейплей,интерфейс,можно играть с другом(кооператив).и самое главное просто ЧУДЕСНЫЙ сюжет.Игра подойдет для взрослых и для детей.Денег не жалко. P.S. есть русская озвучка и субтитры;)

I only am NOT recommending this for single player.  It was a bit scattered, hard to follow, and was more frustrating than fun.  However as a cooperative title this is a super fun puzzle game with great humor and challenge. Play the cooperative  campaign with a friend, skip the single player.

Excellent game - on a par with Half Life and Bioshock franchises. EVERYONE must try this game. The single player campaign is a bit short but there's a co-op mode and community chambers (some of them as good as originals) and mods so you'll get sick of puzzles LONG before you've run out of things to do - buying this game will provide you with at least 40 hours of gameplay, that is, if you can hack it so much :D

I love Portal 2. My friend told me about this game and we play it together often. This has set the bar for puzzle games, as far as I'm concerned.
In my Top 5 best games ever

Hands down one of the BEST games I've ever played. Really. As the game neared to the end, I found myself feeling sad because it was almost over. Not only are the puzzles challenging and FUN, but the general story and are WONDERFUL (seriously, just so so good). I might just play it again....

Singleplayer: Great experience and good puzzles. Got stuck few times, but that's a sign of challenge. Story is good, e.t.c.

Multiplayer: Played Splitscreen with my cousin for a whole weekend, only playing this game. Really fun when you're two playing.

Pros: If you like puzzle games, you'll LOVE this game!!
Cons: Doesn't play ANY music at all while doing puzzels, which makes the gameplay depressing and boring. 

8/10

Entretenido es poco, me ha sorprendido gratamente este juego, no esperaba mucho y tenía curiosidad de ver el tema de los portales pero una vez vas avanzando en el juego te das cuenta de lo divertido que es y de las posibilidades que ofrecen los portales.
Se lo han currado mucho diseñando los niveles, sobre todo los del final.

More of the good stuff!
I read somewhere that this is a sequel for a game "that doesn´t need a sequel"; it´s true. Portal is pretty much perfect, still people - me included - never get enough of solving mazes with a portal gun, so Portal 2 is basically the same thing you got with the first game. Which of course means that Portal2 is just as good as Portal, as entertaining and fun.
So by all means do play it, you will be happy you did.

p.s.
Some of the levels in the first research facility - deep underground, where you learn of the history of Aperture - do feel a bit too long/unnecessary; but they do test your inventive and capacity to find solutions, so they are not too bad.

I first got to try this game at a friends house, they let me play a few levels and after that, I had to buy the game.

It's a strategy/puzzle game and the story line is entertaining. I love both characther, Wheatley and GLaDOS. Not to mention being able to make your own levels and sharing it with others online is interesting as well. Once you beat the game you can go online and see how many puzzles you can accomplish that other people have created.

I highly recomment this game, especially if you love puzzle solving with commical rivalry and an entertaining story.

Whatever praise I have for this game will not do it justice. Portal 2 is probably one of the best games I have EVER played. The dialogue is top notch, genuinely the funniest dark humor I've ever heard--along with the first Portal, which you should also buy. The campaign is perfect and has a fantastic ending. The co-op multiplayer is also fantastic, provided you have good communication between the two of you and one of you haven't played it before. This game is amazing. Please buy it. 10/10

This game is a must have for new PC gamers. It's a classic.

Just to let you all know, yes this game DID make me smarter.

Yes, I have uploaded my wife's conscience into a potato.

Also, to prove that I AM smarter, I would like to note that I am listining to some bach, while reading a book.

Anyway. Just finished the last one. The hardest one. Machiavelli. Do not know what all the fuss was about. Understood it perfectly. Have you read that one? 

Yeah, doubt it.

You should get the game, it will make you smarter.

After reading the books of course.

This is a tough one to review. I have no interest in playing it by myself, on the simple grounds that I'm not smart enough for 95% of the levels. Multiplayer, however, has lead to a lot of colorful conversations between my self and the poor soul who thought it'd be fun to play with me. 

I can't say that love it. But I can't say that I hate it.

当结尾音乐响起的时候我差点流泪了，是的，我没能想到这样一个仅仅三个出场角色的解密游戏的剧情居然能够感染到我。GLaDOS富有特点的声音很吸引我，而整个游戏流程也正是因为有了她的声音一路陪伴，才显得不那么孤单。
+巧妙的关卡设计
+简单却又丰满的角色塑造
+简体中文
+结尾音乐

Эта игра даёт шанс побывать во вселенной half-life. Отсроумный сюжет, который повествует о конфликте Человека с его творением AI. Действительно ли возможно ли сингулярность в реальности? Вот одна из проблемм которые поднимает эта игра. 
Графика выполнена на лучшем уровне, всё аскетично но целесообразно обстановке. 
Игра захватывает, и погиграв час, ты понимаешь что не будет тебе сна как минимум 2 дня, ведь так интресно что стоит за цепью событий развивающихся в игре.
Very entertaining! i love this game.... MUST BUY AND TRY
